title: Identity Platform Ownership

title: Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Require MFA for employee and contractor access to critical systems.

title: Privileged Access Reviews
description: Review administrator privileges on a fixed cadence and remove stale access.

title: Endpoint Hardening Baseline
description: Maintain baseline endpoint security settings and monitor drift.

title: Patch Cadence
description: Track patching SLAs and verify critical patches are deployed within target windows.

title: Vulnerability Triage
description: Prioritize vulnerabilities by exploitability and business impact.

title: Logging Retention
description: Retain security-relevant logs long enough to support investigations.

title: Alert Response Workflow
description: Define response ownership and escalation for high-severity alerts.

description: Protect stored sensitive data with managed encryption keys.

title: Data Encryption In Transit
description: Use modern TLS settings for service-to-service and user traffic.

title: Incident Readiness
description: Maintain an incident response plan with clear communication channels.

title: Backup and Restore Testing
description: Test data restoration procedures and capture recovery outcomes.

title: Change Approval Trail
description: Record security-impacting changes and their approvals.

title: Asset Inventory Coverage
description: Track production assets with ownership and risk context.

title: Vendor Due Diligence
description: Assess critical vendors before onboarding and during renewal.

title: Security Awareness Program
description: Run periodic security training and track participation.

title: Data Handling Guidance
description: Define handling expectations for confidential and regulated data.

title: Network Segmentation
description: Separate critical workloads from general-purpose network zones.

title: Business Continuity Governance
description: Maintain continuity playbooks with accountable owners.

title: Metrics and Reporting
description: Publish a recurring security metrics report to leadership.
